name: Driller: The New Fields
description:
Guide the drill through 10 underground caverns collecting oil pockets and battling resident monsters

This is a revised version of the game. For comparison, the original Driller is available here

New additions
▪ All new graphics and levels
▪ Smoother gameplay
▪ Special items to collect
▪ 3 levels of difficulty

Look out for the spanner/wrench Easter Egg!

Scoring
10 points per oil pocket collected
50 points for each monster defeated
10 points for every second under target time
5 points for every metre of max drill lengt

Controls
move - WASD or ARROW KEYS
retract - SPACE
quit game - Q

(retract does not work when playing in HARD MODE)
